A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible\, poorly conceived movie that disrespects the entire saga with an unpalpable plot and saltless characters' performances. All of that allied to an unlikely inorganic comeout\, that fails to surprise the smallest child in the audience much less a SW franchise fan. That makes one wonder how much money Disney payed RT or how credible are their critics to give a 91% percent rate on this Johnson's poop garbage.
